entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle. High 15 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 15 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to showers after midnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 16 except 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 in the morning. High 16 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
